message.welcome:
Hi, @{user}!

Have you seen the HBO comedy series 'Silicon Valley'? Remember the 'Hotdog or Not Hotdog' app created by Jian Yang?

This bot is the realization of that idea! Send a photo and get a prediction of whether it's a hotdog or not.
message.available_commands: The following commands are available to you:
message.available_subscriptions: The following subscriptions are available to you:
message.enter_username: Enter the username in the format @user:
message.unsupported_command: This feature is currently unavailable. We are already working on it. Please try again later.
message.select_image: Multiple objects detected in the photo. Select the image for which you want a prediction:
message.probability: There is a {probability}% probability that the photo is a hotdog.
message.probability_with_index: Object {index} in the photo has a {probability}% probability of being a hotdog.
message.thanks_for_feedback: Thank you for your feedback! It will help us improve the bot!
error.internal: Internal error. We are already working on it. Please try again later.
error.too_many_objects: Too many objects in the photo
error.only_one_image: Only one image can be uploaded
error.too_many_objects_in_photo: Too many objects in the photo. Try cropping the photo to no more than 10 objects
